title: Vue.js Workshop
description: Learn Vue.js fundamentals and best practices. This comprehensive workshop covers component development, state management with Pinia, and building scalable applications.

title: JavaScript Bootcamp
description: Intensive JavaScript training for beginners and intermediate developers. Topics include async programming, ES6+ features, and practical project-based learning.

title: Web Design Conference 2025
description: Annual conference bringing together web designers and developers to share insights on the latest trends in web design, UX/UI best practices, and responsive design techniques.

title: Nuxt 3 Advanced Patterns
description: Deep dive into Nuxt 3 advanced patterns including auto-imports, composables, middleware, and plugin architecture. Perfect for intermediate to advanced developers.

title: Frontend Performance Optimization
description: Master techniques to optimize your frontend application performance. Learn about code splitting, lazy loading, image optimization, and performance monitoring.

title: UX/UI Design Masterclass
description: Learn principles of user experience and interface design. This masterclass covers user research, prototyping, usability testing, and design systems.

title: React Hooks Deep Dive
description: Understand React Hooks in depth. Topics include useState, useEffect, useContext, custom hooks, and performance optimization with hooks.

title: GraphQL for Modern Applications
description: Learn GraphQL fundamentals and how to integrate it with your frontend applications. Covers queries, mutations, subscriptions, and best practices.
